title: Grungy font with somewhat random dotted strokes surrounding it and another font
content:
[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208im_/http:/i.imgur.com/VClY7IZ.png "Hosted by imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/imgur.com/VClY7IZ)

and

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208im_/http:/i.imgur.com/D0H1TNV.png "Hosted by imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/imgur.com/D0H1TNV)

Its from this site:  
 [http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tomorrow-s-roundtable--2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/www.indiegogo.com/projects/tomorrow-s-roundtable--2 "http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tomorrow-s-roundtable--2")

Please help me identify it. Thanks

Font: 

 Needlework Good, One Direction 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: dontbugme

comments.content: "THE REVOLUTION..." is a font called **[One Direction (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=OneDirection%20-%20Medium&fid=97a3959eb7cd8d7a31cb6cbae9140ff1&fsize=60&text=THE%20REVOLUTION%20WILL%20BE%20TELEVISED&wrap=2)**

Ok thanks.  
Anybody else on the other font??
It is somewhat similar to Fabrics but Fabrics has only caps letters

Anyone typography experts know which font would go well with "One Direction"?  
Thanks

"the show" font is [Needlework Good](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140208/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=112&page=3&text=the+show) by Galdino Otten, a Free for Personal Use font at dafont.com.
